Posts.Content: I don't think you are in denial... or else you wouldn't have plucked up the courage to start writing straight away. It has taken me 5 months and a mastectomy to finally get around to joining the website. I think you must be dealing with it each step at a time. This is a journey you just can't plan. Good days and bad days, but days.. so far so good. jude xx
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed, but why am i so calm?
